title: Theodore Roosevelt Island: TR's Birthday Party
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     TR's Birthday Party              Theodore Roosevelt's Birthday Party          Help us celebrate the 158th birthday of our 26th president with an afternoon of activities designed to appeal to the young—or young at heart—in all of us. Drop in for birthday treats and hands-on activities in the memorial plaza on Theodore Roosevelt Island. Saturday, October 22, 2016 11 am to 3 pm "Teedie," as his family called the young Theodore Roosevelt, delighted in feats of strength, tales of adventure, and first-hand observation of the natural world. Come explore the pastimes he enjoyed from childhood all the way to the White House.
